about_the_game:
Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR is a puzzle game which takes place in the ocean's depths. You play as a penguin thief who must guide his teammate to escape from the casino with the loot.

The game is based on a board game with the same name, created to be an alternative controller game.

To guide your penguin partner :
  • Call him with the right number and use your voice to guide him with the phone,
  • spot the casino with the help of the cameras to plan a way out for your accomplice,
  • ...and thus allow him to avoid the guards!

Gameplay

  • Take part in a penguin's heist, be the sentinel for your partner from the casino security room to understand its defenses and come up with the best plan to escape.
  • Guide your partner using your voice whilst avoiding the casino guards.
  • Discover the underwater cartoon universe of Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR with its inhabitants.

Features

  • Writing & Planning: Look for information around you, use the tools available and plan various paths to the exit.
  • Communication: Use your voice to help your partner escape with the treasure by pointing them in the right direction.
  • Execute your plan and... see how it goes!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: VR headset is required
